title: Common Core Metadata Schema
description: The metadata format for all federal open data. Validates a single JSON object entry (as opposed to entire Data.json catalog).

accessLevel.description: The degree to which this dataset could be made publicly-available, regardless of whether it has been made available. Choices: public (Data asset is or could be made publicly available to all without restrictions), restricted public (Data asset is available under certain use restrictions), or non-public (Data asset is not available to members of the public)
accessLevel.title: Public Access Level

accessLevelComment.title: Access Level Comment
accessLevelComment.description: An explanation for the selected "accessLevel" including instructions for how to access a restricted file, if applicable, or explanation for why a "non-public" or "restricted public" data assetis not "public," if applicable. Text, 255 characters.

accrualPeriodicity.title: Frequency
accrualPeriodicity.description: Frequency with which dataset is published.

bureauCode.title: Bureau Code
bureauCode.description: Federal agencies, combined agency and bureau code from OMB Circular A-11, Appendix C in the format of 015:010.

contactPoint.title: Contact Name
contactPoint.description: Contact person’s name for the asset.

dataDictionary.title: Data Dictionary
dataDictionary.description: URL to the data dictionary for the dataset or API. Note that documentation other than a data dictionary can be referenced using Related Documents as shown in the expanded fields.

dataQuality.title: Data Quality
dataQuality.description: Whether the dataset meets the agency’s Information Quality Guidelines (true/false).

description.title: Description
description.description: Human-readable description (e.g., an abstract) with sufficient detail to enable a user to quickly understand whether the asset is of interest.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: Holds multiple download URLs for datasets composed of multiple files and/or file types

accessURL.title: Download URL
accessURL.description: URL providing direct access to the downloadable distribution of a dataset.

format.title: Format
format.description: The file format or API type of the distribution.

identifier.title: Unique Identifier
identifier.description: A unique identifier for the dataset or API as maintained within an Agency catalog or database.

keyword.title: Tags
keyword.description: Tags (or keywords) help users discover your dataset; please include terms that would be used by technical and non-technical users.

landingPage.title: Homepage URL
landingPage.description: Alternative landing page used to redirect user to a contextual, Agency-hosted “homepage” for the Dataset or API when selecting this resource from the Data.gov user interface.

license.title: License
license.description: The license dataset or API is published with. See Open Licenses for more information.

modified.title: Last Update
modified.description: Most recent date on which the dataset was changed, updated or modified.

PrimaryITInvestmentUII.title: Primary IT Investment UII
PrimaryITInvestmentUII.description: For linking a dataset with an IT Unique Investment Identifier (UII)

programCode.title: Program Code
programCode.description: Federal agencies, list the primary program related to this data asset, from the Federal Program Inventory. Use the format of 015:001

references.title: Related Documents
references.description: Related documents such as technical information about a dataset, developer documentation, etc.

spatial.title: Spatial
spatial.description: The range of spatial applicability of a dataset. Could include a spatial region like a bounding box or a named place.

systemOfRecords.title: System of Records
systemOfRecords.description: If the systems is designated as a system of records under the Privacy Act of 1974, provide the URL to the System of Records Notice related to this dataset.

temporal.title: Temporal
temporal.description: The range of temporal applicability of a dataset (i.e., a start and end date of applicability for the data).

theme.title: Category
theme.description: Main thematic category of the dataset.

title.title: Title
title.description: Human-readable name of the asset. Should be in plain English and include sufficient detail to facilitate search and discovery.

webService.title: Endpoint
webService.description: Endpoint of web service to access dataset.
